text:
Ranveer Shows What 'Asli' Hip-Hop Is In Gully Boy Teaser & Fans Are Already Bobbing Their Heads
Ranveer Shows What 'Asli' Hip-Hop Is In Gully Boy Teaser & Fans Are Already Bobbing Their Heads
Is there something that Ranveer Singh can’t do? – that’s one question that fans have been asking since the time the first teaser of Gully Boy is out. In this upcoming film he is playing a street rapper!
Be it doing a tough role of Alauddin Khalji or a masala entertainer like Simmba, Ranveer Singh can easily get into the shoes of any character, don’t you agree?
In this Zoya Akhtar film which also stars Alia Bhatt alongside him, he is playing the role of a rapper. And just like you may have expected, he will be seen rapping in his own voice.
Giving us a sneak peek of that, before the trailer is released, the makers have unveiled a teaser in which Ranveer Singh introduces fans to Asli Hip Hop rap. He stuns his fans further as he romances Alia Bhatt and Kalki Koechlin.
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 336 SHARES 544 SHARES 247 SHARES 699 SHARES
Screengrab
Without further ado, watch the teaser below.
And fans are left enthralled.
This one is insane Guruji!!! Fire on fire ! Singh is King :) — Lada Guruden Singh (@ladasingh) January 4, 2019
Wooaaaah!! Its a masterpiece @RanveerOfficial I can't believe that you have sung it!!!
Sachmein#AsliHipHop se mila diya hindostan ko👌👌👌 — 💗Armaan's Choco girl💗 (@kessiechauhan22) January 4, 2019
I am so DEAD !!.... 🤪🤪🤪😇😇😇... AAaAaaaaaaa...#Merawala CHAMP !!... Rappingggg bhiii aur Acting Bhiii !!! — Atikin_Hgnis (@Atikin_Hgnis) January 4, 2019
Brilliant is the word for this one baba 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍 — Nitya lamba (@Nityalamba44) January 4, 2019
I’m actually living for the vibe of this movie. Can’t wait to see more 😭😍 — Aashna ♡ (@_aashnaa__) January 4, 2019
Ranveer i cannot even articulate my feelings or reaction RN 😭🔥😭🔥🔥🔥 #GullyBoyTeaser is everything and more than I imagined — Kalai💕|芸術| シ GULLY BOY FEB14 (@mynameisKalai) January 4, 2019
Apna Din aayega nhi bhauu tumhara din aa gaya 🔥🔥🔥🔥
Aaj dekho asli hip hop india ko tum ❤️💯🎤 @RanveerOfficial
This teaser increased my excitement for the movie baba😘😘😘 — Bhavika❤ #Simmba 🦁👮🏻‍♂️💪🏽🔥 (@RanveerianBhavo) January 4, 2019
Awesome Ranveer KING , amazing is the word. You rule this trailer , lovely to see Kalki Back . 2 great actors together 👍 — Beena (@Bina94475085) January 4, 2019
OMG!!!!!!! This is damn cool.....Can't wait. Bring it on 🙌👍✊❤ — Suzar (@Shreeyajoshi8) January 4, 2019
So, is there something that Ranveer Singh can’t do? We’re still trying to figure out! Meanwhile, if you're excited for this one, Gully Boy is hitting the screens on Feb 14. Mark the date!
title: Ranveer Shows What 'Asli' Hip-Hop Is In Gully Boy Teaser & Fans Are Already Bobbing Their Heads
